response.original_title: BABYMETAL - Live at Inazuma Rock Festival 2013
response.overview: BABYMETAL's appearance at the Inazuma Rock Festival in 2013 was a standout performance that solidified their rising star status in the music world. Taking place at the scenic shores of Lake Biwa, the festival saw the young trio of Su-metal, Moametal, and Yuimetal deliver a high-octane set. Their performance was marked by their signature blend of idol J-pop and heavy metal, featuring energetic tracks like "Ijime, Dame, Zettai" and "Headbangeeeeerrrrr!!!!!" The sheer power and enthusiasm of BABYMETAL, combined with the crowd's vigorous response, made their show at Inazuma Rock Festival a pivotal moment in their early career, captivating an audience beyond their usual fan base and showcasing their potential on a large scale.
response.title: BABYMETAL - Live at Inazuma Rock Festival 2013
